verses.kjv: The transgression of the wicked saith within my heart, that there is no fear of God before his eyes.
verses.ct: Sin speaks to the wicked deep in their hearts — they have no reverence for God at all.

verses.kjv: For he flattereth himself in his own eyes, until his iniquity be found to be hateful.
verses.ct: They deceive themselves with self-flattery, unable to see how hateful their sin really is.

verses.kjv: The words of his mouth are iniquity and deceit: he hath left off to be wise, and to do good.
verses.ct: Everything they say is corrupt and dishonest; they have abandoned wisdom and stopped doing what is right.

verses.kjv: He deviseth mischief upon his bed; he setteth himself in a way that is not good; he abhorreth not evil.
verses.ct: They lie in bed plotting evil; they commit themselves to a harmful path and never reject what is wrong.

verses.kjv: Thy mercy, O LORD, is in the heavens; and thy faithfulness reacheth unto the clouds.
verses.ct: Your mercy, LORD, stretches to the heavens; your faithfulness reaches to the clouds.

verses.kjv: Thy righteousness is like the great mountains; thy judgments are a great deep: O LORD, thou preservest man and beast.
verses.ct: Your righteousness stands like the tallest mountains; your justice runs as deep as the ocean. LORD, you protect both people and animals.

verses.kjv: How excellent is thy lovingkindness, O God! therefore the children of men put their trust under the shadow of thy wings.
verses.ct: How precious is your unfailing love, God! All of humanity finds shelter in the shadow of your wings.

verses.kjv: They shall be abundantly satisfied with the fatness of thy house; and thou shalt make them drink of the river of thy pleasures.
verses.ct: They feast on the abundance of your house, and you let them drink from your river of delights.

verses.kjv: For with thee is the fountain of life: in thy light shall we see light.
verses.ct: For you are the source of life itself — in your light, we see light.

verses.kjv: O continue thy lovingkindness unto them that know thee; and thy righteousness to the upright in heart.
verses.ct: Keep pouring out your unfailing love on those who know you, and your righteousness on those whose hearts are honest.

verses.kjv: Let not the foot of pride come against me, and let not the hand of the wicked remove me.
verses.ct: Don't let the proud trample me, and don't let the wicked drive me away.

verses.kjv: There are the workers of iniquity fallen: they are cast down, and shall not be able to rise.
verses.ct: Look — those who practice evil have fallen! They have been thrown down and cannot get back up.
